testcase.name: Select insurance for PME International envelopes

failure.message: failed Select insurance for PME International envelopes

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Select insurance for PME International envelopes
Given Login as horizon_engra3@pb.com And I navigate to Create Label page and select Priority Mail Envelopes packages And on the create label page I verify default senders address And on the create label page I enter Valid International Recipient Address And on the create label page I click on Recipient's Accept and Verify button Then on the create label page I see that address was accepted When on create label page I select Priority Mail Express Flat Rate Envelopes as package type When on create label page I select Legal Express Flat Rate Envelope as package type And on create label page I enter weight as 3 lbs and 0 oz And on create label page I click on Accept button And on customs form I select Gifts as customs type And on customs form I add item as item1 from customs_items.json And on customs form I click on add item button And on customs form I select NOEEI 30.36 - Shipments destined to Canada as AES exemption And on customs form I click on accept T&C checkbox And on the create label page I select Insurance as service option And on the create label page I calculate -1 dollars amount for Insurance option Then on the create label page I verify that Value must be between $1.00 and $5,000.00. error message is displayed for Insurance option And on the create label page I calculate 200 dollars amount for Insurance option Then on the create label page I verify that fee for Insurance option is Included And on the create label page I calculate 1000 dollars amount for Insurance option Then on the create label page I verify that fee for Insurance option is 13.05 And on the create label page I calculate 5000 dollars amount for Insurance option Then on the create label page I verify that fee for Insurance option is 59.05 And on the create label page I calculate 5001 dollars amount for Insurance option Then on the create label page I verify that Value must be between $1.00 and $5,000.00. error message is displayed for Insurance option
Message:
Unable to locate element: {"method":"id","selector":"username"} (Selenium::WebDriver::Error::NoSuchElementError) [remote server] file:///var/folders/f6/pbn__5hs3957gbdzr0tb2jqc00007q/T/webdriver-profile20151020-44651-148gwo2/extensions/fxdriver@googlecode.com/components/driver-component.js:10667:in `FirefoxDriver.prototype.findElementInternal_' [remote server] file:///var/folders/f6/pbn__5hs3957gbdzr0tb2jqc00007q/T/webdriver-profile20151020-44651-148gwo2/extensions/fxdriver@googlecode.com/components/driver-component.js:623:in `fxdriver.Timer.prototype.setTimeout/<.notify' ./features/pages/sign_in_page.rb:34:in `enter_email_address' ./features/step_definitions/sign_in_page_steps.rb:26:in `/^I enter my user ID as "(.*?)"$/' ./features/step_definitions/sign_in_page_steps.rb:11:in `/^Login as (.*)$/' features/test/shippingUIAutomation/create_label/international_packages/create_label_international_options_for_pmi_envelopes.feature:6:in `Given Login as horizon_engra3@pb.com'
